story:
Once upon a time, in a small village in Vietnam, there was a kind and curious little boy named Minh. Minh's favorite thing to do was to explore the lush green forests and crystal-clear rivers that surrounded his village.

One day, while Minh was playing near the river, he spotted a beautiful bird with vibrant feathers of red, orange, and yellow. Minh had never seen such a magnificent bird before and was immediately captivated.

The bird, sensing Minh's kind heart, began to sing a beautiful song that echoed throughout the forest. Minh was so enchanted by the bird's song that he sat down and listened for what seemed like hours.

As the sun began to set, the bird flew down and perched on Minh's shoulder. The bird whispered in Minh's ear, "Thank you for appreciating my song. I am the phoenix, a magical bird that brings good luck and happiness to those who are pure of heart. I have been searching for someone worthy of my gift, and I have found that person in you."

The phoenix then presented Minh with a small, shimmering feather. "This feather has the power to grant you one wish. Use it wisely," the phoenix said before flying away.

Minh couldn't believe what had just happened. He ran back to his village, clutching the feather tightly in his hand. He thought long and hard about what he wanted to wish for.

Finally, he decided. He wished for his village to be the happiest and healthiest place it could be, with an abundance of food and resources for everyone.

As soon as Minh made his wish, the feather began to glow and transform into a brilliant light that enveloped the entire village. When the light faded, the villagers couldn't believe their eyes. Their village had become a verdant paradise, teeming with lush crops and sparkling rivers.

Minh's selfless wish had brought prosperity and joy to his entire village, and they all celebrated his kindness and generosity. From that day on, Minh was known as the hero of his village, and his name was whispered with reverence and admiration.

And as for the phoenix, it continued to sing its beautiful song, bringing good fortune and happiness to all who heard it.

As Minh drifted off to sleep that night, he knew that he had made a difference in his village, and he felt a sense of peace and contentment that stayed with him always.

And with that, my dear son, it's time for you to close your eyes and dream of all the wonderful things you can do to make the world a better place. Goodnight, and sweet dreams.
